# Test Chapter

This is a test chapter with a Mermaid diagram.

```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Start] --> B{Decision}
    B -->|Yes| C[OK]
    B -->|No| D[End]
```

Some text after the diagram.

```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
    Alice->>Bob: Hello Bob!
    Bob-->>Alice: Hi Alice!
```

And another paragraph.
